Aries: You attract bold lovers. Passion = priority.
Taurus: Loyal lovers. Love grows slowly but surely.
Gemini: Flirty, witty partners. You need convo chemistry.
Cancer: You marry into emotion. You crave safe love.
Leo: Big love, grand gestures. Dramatic but loyal.
Virgo: Devoted partners. You love through help and fixing.
Libra: Classic romance. You attract Venusian vibes.
Sagittarius: You fall for adventurers. Soulmate on a journey.
Capricorn: You seek structure. Partners = life plans.
Pisces: You crave soul-deep love. Love = poetry.
